title: Making Team Plat+
body:
Looking to make a team, hopefully it will be of platinum plus players, I will not be playing in the team but hopefully I'll be able to be some sort of organiser/owner. Hopefully I get some responses, you can add me on discord at Julez#3706 for more details and to set up a team hopefully :)

* Now in need of Top, Mid and Support.
* Currently the two players I have are Platinum 1 adc and Diamond 5 jungler.
